name: MatchResult

methods.name: getEntityType
methods.description: Returns the entity type of the matching rule.

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: Returns errors that occurred during matching for the matching rule.

methods.name: getMatchEngine
methods.description: Returns the match engine for the matching rule.

methods.name: getMatchRecords
methods.description: Returns information about the duplicates for the matching rule.

methods.name: getRule
methods.description: Returns the developer name of the matching rule.

methods.name: getSize
methods.description: Returns the number of duplicates detected by the matching rule.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: Returns false if thereâ€™s an error with the matching rule, and true if the matching rule successfully ran.

description: Represents the duplicate results for a matching rule.
